resources.string: Press and hold on a shape to drag and drop it to the desired location.
This app is still under development so expect missing features and bugs.

Welcome to the Machine Learning Workflow module! 
 In this module, we will be learning: 
 - What is Machine Learning 
 - Types of Machine Learning 
 - Steps for building a Machine Learning project 
 And much more! 
 Letâ€™s dive in!

What is Machine Learning? \n ML is a type of artificial intelligence (AI) that allows programs to become more accurate at predicting outcomes without being programmed to do so. Machine learning algorithms rely on data as input to predict new output values.

Ingredients of a Machine Learning Project 
 -Dataset 
 -Machine Learning Model 
 -Training Algorithm

Steps for a ML project (part 1) 
 - Loading the data 
 - Visualizing the data 
 - Preprocessing the data

Steps for a ML project (part 2) 
 - Building the model 
 - Train loop 
 - Evaluate model 
 - Launch model
